Borders

On This Page

  • Border

Border

When set, all borders default to a 1px width which can be offset using border--width-{ i }.

Class

Class Result
border

Set border.
no-border

Remove border.
border-x

Set x-axis borders (left and right).
border-y

Set y-axis borders (top and bottom).
border-t

Set top border.
border-b

Set bottom border.
border-r

Set right border.
border-l

Set left border.
border--width-{ 1-5 }

Set custom border width.
border--color-{ color }

Set border color.

Visualizer

Try this! See how to use the border utilities!

Example Card

Example Card

Example Card

Platform UI

Built by the Ritter Insurance Marketing development team, aka RIMdev, to power our platform of staff and agent tools.

Platform UI is available on npm and uses SkellyCSS, also on npm and github

Current version 1.6.3
